Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the authorization of the city of Oswego to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Relates to extending the authorization of the city of Oswego to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the city of Oswego to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
